```{r}
# Goals
for (i in c(31,40,49,58,67,76,85,94,103,112,121,130)){
  plot1 <- team %>%
  ggplot(aes_string(colnames(team[i]), colnames(team[26]))) +
  geom_point(stat = "identity")
  
  print(plot1)
}
```
